website_summaries.verdict: Representing the current pinnacle of smartphone technology, the Samsung Galaxy Note 8 phone has everything that's great about the Galaxy S8, plus dual cameras and an S Pen stylus.
cons: Too big to work with current Gear VR headset

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FROM R&A Solutions
customer_reviews.text: R&A Solutions have ignored all emails and the phone number doesn't accept incoming calls. Scam company that should be avoided. Ignored messages mean I cannot leave a seller review so doing so here. Phone has issues with charging (stops randomly and get intermittent warning about water in the port despite it being dry outside so can't be water in there)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with a Note!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my four years old Note 4 which was still going very strong, only the start up button gave up. Note 9 just came out and it's overpriced, so I went for Note 8 which is a very nice device! I still prefer the flat screen and will definitely miss the possibility to change my battery, however Note 8 is a big step forward and I am happy with the upgrade. I don't mind needing to charge it more often, it charges in a heartbeat anyway. Note 9 is not worth the price difference (I saved £360 choosing the Note 8) for what this last year's beast is able to do.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note
customer_reviews.text: I Spent a lot of time reviewing phones. I wanted something to meet my need for a phone and a tablet. Really struggled with the price of the galaxy note but I am so glad I did. Really love it. The size, weight, looks and the interface is so easy. Delighted!!! Thank you Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C.

customer_reviews.title: Brand new in Samsung sealed box
customer_reviews.text: I just received delivery of Samsung Note 8 from SmartTech Store. I'm delighted to say it came in a genuine Samsung box with a Samsung seal so it's obviously 100% new and unused. I'm a very happy customer and I haven't even opened the box yet! I obviously can't give a proper review yet but hope to once I get started using it. Watch this space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best smartphone ever
customer_reviews.text: I was always afraid to buy a smartphone online. But given the price of Note 8 I decided to give it a try. Without a doubt it was a good deal, the phone arrived 1 day earlier than expected, super well packed and with explanations of the store itself regarding the warranty. I changed my iPhone 6 (after almost 10 years using only Apple phones) and I don't regret anything, what a difference! Best choice ever. Thanks for the professional service, I recommend the shop to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone and the price! Phone arrived following day which was quicker than I expected. Phone was sourced from Germany but that was soon sorted.. However the charger failed within 24 hours and have been promised a replacement but it has not arrived yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screen burn-in within one year of use and Samsung will not repair.
customer_reviews.text: I play games on my phone and I can see the gaming icon on the bottom tray at all times. I have tried to get Samsung to repair it but they won't honour their warranty without my paying for the very slight damage to the screen. To my mind, it doesn't matter whether there is a bit of damage at the very bottom of the screen. Their product in faulty. They need to fix it. I have bought from Samsung: 2 tablets, 1 television, 4 Galaxy Notes, and a few other various items I can't remember. But I'm not buying another Samsung item if they don't honour their warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Elysian42

customer_reviews.title: A big improvement on my old Samsung Galaxy Note 2.
customer_reviews.text: My Note 2 was still working perfectly after 5 years, but it was a bit too slow for modern apps and browsing. I'm glad I upgraded. The Note 8 is not perfect: the fingerprint sensor is too pernickety to be relied on, the face recognition can be fooled by showing it your photograph, and the wraparound screen means your grip hand can accidentally touch the scroll bars. But the camera is unbelievably good, the wi-fi management is much improved and the processor speed is excellent. I wouldn't pay the just-released price, but now is an excellent time to by.
customer_reviews.author: RandyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Great phone but was not factory unlocked like advertised
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is fantastic. Using it almost 1 year now. Great screen, very fast, have had no issues. My only problem is with the seller. They claimed it was unlocked which it was but this phone was clearly initially on the vodaphone network, turned on and unlocked. It has vodaphone software built into the phone which I have disabled. Not factory unlocked like advertised but it works perfectly on the eir network and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Shane W.

customer_reviews.title: Note 4 to Note 8, happy days!
customer_reviews.text: The device is as advertised, check the size before purchase! As cons(for me), you can't fit a protective screen if you also want to use a tough armour protective case, also the new rounded glassy smartphone design(that looks really good) is not as sturdy, I find it more fragile and really have to be carefull not dropping it. Also HATE the headphones, they have that jellyfish design that has to go all the way inside your ears. Keeping in mind I have been intensively using a Samsung Note 4 for the last 4 years, I am very happy with the Note 8 as a replacement! The battery lasts very well.
customer_reviews.author: munteanustefanh

customer_reviews.title: The Note 8 is a cracker
customer_reviews.text: As always with the Note series of phones the device itself is a pleasure to use with great screen movement and exceptional functionality. Obviously the battery takes a bit but it charges quickly so it's not that big a deal. Regards Rich utg
customer_reviews.author: EastvilleErn

customer_reviews.title: This phone is outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding display and form. Buttery smooth action and very fast processor, even though this is the Exynos variant. Don't buy the clear view LED cover with this, as it no longer seems to have software support yet. The secure folder option (similar to Private Mode in previous phones) does not seem to work either.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Technickle

customer_reviews.title: Premium product
customer_reviews.text: Pondered for a long time whether to buy this phone.... so glad l did. Full of content, l will be quite a while delving into all the features that are pre loaded A bargain for a older flagship phone which still gives all the new models a hard run for the money. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mr G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it...
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday..love samsung pay feature, live messages, professional photo editor, amazing picture quality and product delivery was fast as well. Got a lot of complements from others. I upgraded from note 3 to note 8 after 5years.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Battery dry fast like fast charging too. Screen protector must have been little more bigger , as I got won't covers the sides. Camera is good and excellent. Every phone will surely have some pros and cros I liked the phone
customer_reviews.author: Rajeev

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as describe, very quick and well packaged.
customer_reviews.text: The phone turned up as described. In perfect condition. Works well. It arrived the next day and well packed. Happy with product and happy with seller. "Thank you"
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant all round phone, amazing display!
customer_reviews.text: The screen on this phone is amazing, rich colours and inky blacks. The phone feels refined and well built. The water proofing works as i went swimming with it to do some under water videos and the picture quality is very impressive. The s pen is really handy feature that i use for making quick notes and colouring in. Overall this is a beast of a phone and i would highly recommend at this reduced price as it works out very good value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived earlier than expected. Very happy with it so far. Bought to replace another one that broke. Excellent condition and great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Great Price
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw this phone I wasn't very sure buying it from amazon but so very pleased I did. Great phone works really well and I have no complaints at all, buying it from here saved me £350.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Sutton-beynon

customer_reviews.title: At £560, I thought it would be dodgy! But you're in safe hands
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with Note 8. Secure box, all the codes check out. What more can you ask for? A £799 phone for £560 (at time of purchase)
customer_reviews.author: Talon

customer_reviews.title: Such a beatiful piece of technology
customer_reviews.text: Best phone out there if not on a budget. Easily my best ever. Does everything you ask and in style too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn't be sold in UK
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a great phone in America, but frequency is too high and doesn't work efficiently in the UK.
customer_reviews.author: dave69

customer_reviews.title: Battery weak, but still great phone
customer_reviews.text: Battery almost dies in 2 years. Love the phone but gets stuck a lot maybe also cuz i have a lot of rubbish and games in it . Pen stopped working as well last year, front camera is weak
customer_reviews.author: Tanase Laurentiu Anton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I ever had, need I say more. I won’t be changing it for at least 4 years
customer_reviews.author: W0lfy

customer_reviews.title: Great phone ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.text: Battery last more then on my 7edge It's smooth and quick. The ram and processor are doing their work verry good. Thanks Samsung n amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Good sized phone and light.
customer_reviews.text: The phone is light and looks good. Had a few issues with locked screen. Had to take to specialist to sort it out. Hopefully will now work fine. Time will tell if it's a phone I will like long term.
customer_reviews.author: Pinksister

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smartphone
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Note8 as a present to my mum which she missed her old Note4. This phone is amazing in every way and shows the great advancements that Samsung has made through the years. Size and durability are amazing screen size and quality the best I have seen and all the features that this phone has are amaizing
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Great service & great phone. The phone was not to my personal taste tho so I returned it after a couple of days and got a speedy refund. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, had it for months and still love it
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely over the moon. It's exactly what I wanted and more. Easy to set up was a bit concerned initially as not much documentation outside of the phone but once my sim card was put in and I connected to my WiFi it all was self explanatory and going great!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Did the job as described.
customer_reviews.text: Good phone. Brand new. Good value for money from this supplier. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Speal

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is back with a great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great price from Amazon Merchant. Item arrived early and is as expected. In terms of the device itself have a look at a few reviews on youtube. Its a great device and the S-Pen is the killer feature!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of the Note series. The camera is amazing on this phone. I actually stopped using my DSLR camera. The screen is great as well. Long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Iulian Jinga

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great communication from the seller and a great phone. Ordered 2 for me and my wife. Had huawaei before but went back to Samsung. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just brilliant! Great phone at a great price. Security boxed. Prompt delivery. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Y.C

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at this price. Nothing comes closer.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone with features that will take a lot of time to fully explore. Battery could be better.
customer_reviews.author: jamjam

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone i ever had.....i love what i can do with the s pen....i recomend it ❤
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.text: delivery was fast, the phone safe. it is wonderful I am delighted with him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you use hard then battery life depletes quite quick. Have had to put on charge before end of day
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. Went from note 2 to this. What a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Argent

customer_reviews.title: Brand new and sealed
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever came from seller brand new boxed and sealed with Samsung seal.works brilliantly

customer_reviews.title: Superb wallet and fits the phone
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is great colour and fits the phone like a glove
customer_reviews.author: G1p77

customer_reviews.title: Half price
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting one for ages but couldn't warrant upgrading from the note 4 till this came up.
customer_reviews.author: Derek j

customer_reviews.title: Amazing service
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the phone, very next day delivered but I missed the parcel .customer service were very helpful. Got the parcel without any delay. Phone looks amazing. Thank you .
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous love it very pleased , went from a Note 4 to this , would buy from seller again A++++

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Im happy with the service but not with the phone

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a phone with the good photo quality and one I'd easily sketch on. I'm glad with my purchase

customer_reviews.title: New galaxy 8 phone
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this purchase. My phone was delivered in 3 days and in brand new condition. Recommend this supplier

customer_reviews.title: this masterpiece is just perfect :D even so if you like to dodle :D
customer_reviews.text: everything is amazing :D if i could change anything it sure could do to be bigger 6.8 would be perfect :) . i hope the next version is bigger :)

customer_reviews.title: Does all you need
customer_reviews.text: Bought after accident to old Note 8 so knew what we were getting. Excellent value for money compared to later models

customer_reviews.text: The phone working well but I have problem whit Samsung pay I can not add my debit card and Olso I can not understand because it's In France language

customer_reviews.title: Top quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone delivered by SmartTech Store for a very good price. The phone is brilliant but small hands may find it difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M.

customer_reviews.title: The screen was damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in March but know after 8 month the screen is half redish
customer_reviews.author: Dawit

customer_reviews.title: Good phone to buy
customer_reviews.text: Phone: good phone for simple daily use, good quality materials, Amazon delivery: good, no complaints
customer_reviews.author: rajiv

customer_reviews.title: worst seller
customer_reviews.text: phones are faulty, earphones are broke and the seller does not carre at all! wouldnt advise anybody
customer_reviews.author: furkan

customer_reviews.title: Great and reliable seller
customer_reviews.text: Absolute quality. Came on the expected date. Phone had no problems. Thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nadim I.

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone
customer_reviews.text: The product is good. I have never had issues with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Ageh

customer_reviews.title: All good.
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone. Quick delivery. Highly recommended. Good seller. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MALGORZATA CIESLAR

customer_reviews.title: Massive leap from the old note phones.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bit of kit. I had a note 3 then s6 and s7 it's nice to back to the note back. Take your time to learn what out can do and it will blow you away. Camera is excellent, screen is awesome and the s pen is so much more useful than it was back in the note 3 or note 4 days. If you use your phone for more than just calls and texts then in my opinion there is no better phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is ace. Company not responding to any aftersales ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is ace. Company not responding to any aftersales enquiries.
customer_reviews.author: Hoopy Frood

customer_reviews.title: It's the best.
customer_reviews.text: No doubt it's the best phone on the market. Honestly nothing comes close. Only thing that I would say needs improvement is the speaker. Hope Samsung can fix for the note 9. There's been a lot of noise about the battery but honestly I'm satisfied I'm getting around 6-7 hours screen on time and by the end of the day after heavy use I've still got around 25% remaining at bedtime
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Was concerned about buying through Amazon about ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Was concerned about buying through Amazon about what I was getting. Reassured myself it was okay and has proved to be, saving over £200 on Carphone Warehouse price. Dropped it and smashed screen within 24hrs. GET A CASE AND SCREEN PROTECTOR WHEN YOU BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. A pleasure to use and very configurable
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. A pleasure to use and very configurable. Some info: Even on max screen resolution i get 5h screen time so the battery life is sufficient to get me through the day.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr Okoniecki

customer_reviews.title: A great phone indeed
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about buying this phone through Amazon, but after a thorough check of the reviews, and the seller's track record, I purchased the phone and it arrived a few days early, wrapped in extra protective packaging. The original box had its protective seal, and I have encountered no problems thus far (waited a week before writing the review). A great phone indeed. The gold looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: fake phone do not buy
customer_reviews.text: this product is fake please do not buy. it works but the s pen features is not configured. i have been to a samsung repair shop and they confirm this product is not original. the s pen is thinner than the origjnal one and not its active at all on the phone. this is one of the unique features of a note 8 it's a shame Amazon is involved in a shady business like this.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ayankoya

customer_reviews.title: Was Superb device now useless.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful phone and immaculate after 20 months use. However it developed a very bad fault a few months ago which I have tried without success to rectify including a factory reset. While typing it will suddenly start deleting all text I have typed. Very fast from the last typed character by character which I cannot stop. This is in different apps and with different keyboards including the standard Samsung. I have tried everything.
customer_reviews.author: redceo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic phone with so many options. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G I Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and fast delivery over the moon so sleek and so fast
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mcclurg

customer_reviews.title: Very good service
customer_reviews.text: My phone is 100% And delivery was quick cant say more good company will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screen covered in scratches after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a huge note fan, this latest phone looks good and does everything I want it to, but even with an official samsung cover the screen is covered in little scratches after a few weeks? Really disappointed as I'm careful and my last note screen is in much better nick after 3 years of use?
customer_reviews.author: Miss s c

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product strongly recommend to anyone thinking of buying one
customer_reviews.author: Joshua e.

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile phone
customer_reviews.text: The pen I find very useful when sending text messages. The phone overall is very easy to navigate and the picture quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone. Quick shipment
customer_reviews.text: Great Phone. Quick shipment, arrived within two days of order. Works even outside UK/Europe. used it in India. but before you leave UK/Europe region you got to make around 10 minutes phone call using UK/Europe SIM card.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan

customer_reviews.title: Ordered from Skywish and everything is perfect. It's a French phone in origin
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from Skywish and everything is perfect. It's a French phone in origin. Just makes it all the more special.
customer_reviews.author: the.sea

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant phablet! Fast, durable, stylish in gold colour, functional with everything you could need, secure and loaded with extras. What is different from my previus device Galaxy S5 is that this is bigger in my hand and the battery lasts less but oh my god the display is a work of art and it is worth it. The pen is very useful and stylish. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Serj

customer_reviews.title: Not in English
customer_reviews.text: Great phone but no English instructions. Phone not in English.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Best Phone I've used. Battery life is not the best but I have got used to it and learned how to make it last a full day. Also put a case on it. Scratches easily.
customer_reviews.author: Matty

customer_reviews.title: Not the version it claims to be
customer_reviews.text: It said it was the UK version, but none of the writing was in English and the plug was not suitable for UK sockets. I have sent it back straight away.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The product was not as described. The specific feature of the product received was a "dual SIM" phone Samsung Note 8, not a single "sim phone". Therefore the feature of the phone was not requested, required or as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Narissa

customer_reviews.title: Da Tech Pro sold as Single sim but actually Dual SIM model. Not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Phone sold by Da Tech Pro as Single sim but turned out to be a Duos dual SIM model so returning. Complete waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: after sales is not good
customer_reviews.text: battery doesn't last its faulty but the seller doesn't take any responsibility and was quick to direct me to samsung instead of dealing with the faulty product . out of pocket and phone.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S8 Note is just as good as the S9 Note and such VFM at the Mo.
customer_reviews.text: The size of phone, size of screen, quality of pictures and videos on screen, security is good speed of processing, easy to navigate and all in all a great device and matches up to the S9 Note which my wife has, The camera and picture quality is nothing but 1st class and the S pen too is excellent and easy to use. All in all a great product and no need to consider the S9 or S10 when it comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny T

customer_reviews.title: Great screen
customer_reviews.text: I like the on-screen slider for turning up screen brightness when in bright sunlight conditions. as new condition in original packaging. Great value at £270 with free next day delivery. Totally amazing! There's nothing I dislike about the phone so far.
customer_reviews.author: GWP

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone, great deal and super fast, free delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone. This was bought to replace my great Samsung Note 4 which is now over 4 years old and is now freezing. This was a great buy and does everything that I need. I have only had this phone for a day but so far so good. The phone arrived a full day before the stated delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: note 8
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time as promised my sender .. packaged well phone was encased in a bubble/ cushion bag.. i was impressed by it.. even Samsung don't do that. Phone was as described with minor scratches , I have no issues with that. Thank you to meeilie mobile . i have used samsung mobiles for a long time now and have no issues with them..

customer_reviews.title: Samsung note 8 phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone was advertised sim free but when inserted a sim in ghana, it comes invalid sim. How a sim free cant take other sims. Again why no refund is applicable if the phone is really a genuine one. In fact l am not happy and sceptical about the product
customer_reviews.author: kwame konadu-yiadom

customer_reviews.title: New in sealed box .
customer_reviews.text: Arrived day early, in a sealed box, brand new, set up in a matter of minutes, had a Note 8 when they were new, and wished I still had it ,hence this purchase, happy days all round
customer_reviews.author: Dogs Wonga

customer_reviews.title: S-Plendid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Much cheaper now the Note 9 is out but still top tier. The S-Pen is a joy to use with some great apps provided by Samsung. The camera is decent though I prefer the layout on Huawei's phones. The battery life could be better but it's not the worst. Great device.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it at the moment
customer_reviews.text: All seem to be good and genuine. The only thing its says uk version but on the box its EU. Had to ask for invoice twice but got it quick after second email sent. Otherwise good phone.used it just around the month no problem so far.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone in the world
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever made for all round package, you may see better one thing on other phone, but if you want it all this is the 📱

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works great
customer_reviews.text: Had a Note 4 previously loved it tried couple of other phones over past year but reverted back to Samsung. Note 8 better than my 4.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy note 8
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a Samsung note 4 and nowbought the note 8. It's perfect for what I need. Screen so clear and great photos. Love it

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous build quality. Clear screen. I have not tested the waterproofness...yet ;-)

customer_reviews.text: Very good telephone very nice pictures and quality nice price

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 8 (SM-N950F) - SIM-Free Smartphone - 64GB - Midnight Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Midnight Black| Style Name:UK Version| Configuration:Single SIM

SAMSUNG SM-N950FZKABTU GALAXY NOTE 8 SMARTPHONE 64GB - BLACK
Samsung Galaxy Note 8 Black - DISPLAY Type Super AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors, Size 6.3 inches, Resolution 1440 x 2960 pixels, Protection Corning Gorilla Glass 5, - HDR10 compliant - 3D Touch (home button only) - Always-on display - Grace UX UI. CAMERA: Primary Dual 12 MP, f/1.7 & f/2.4, OIS, phase detection autofocus, 2x optical zoom, dual-LED (dual tone) flash, Features 1/2.55" sensor size, 1.4 µm pixel size @ 26 mm, 1/3.6" sensor size, 1.0 µm pixel size @ 52 mm, Geo-tagging, simultaneous 4K video and 9MP image recording, touch focus, face/smile detection, Auto HDR, panorama, Video 2160p@30fps, 1080p@60fps, 720p@240fps, HDR, dual-video rec. Secondary 8 MP, f/1.7, autofocus, 1/3.6" sensor size, 1.22 µm pixel size, 1440p@30fps, dual video call, Auto HDR

MORE THAN JUST A PEN
Our improved S Pen comes with greater pressure sensitivity and a thinner tip for a faster response and enhanced precision, letting you show-off your creativity when that moment of inspiration hits. You can even use the S Pen in Live Message to create custom-made emojis and GIFs that include your own handwriting.

PIXEL PERFECT QUALITY EVERY TIME
Whether you're shooting breath-taking scenery or never forget moments with your friends, the Note8's 12MP dual lens camera with a wide-angle and telephoto lens includes live focus which lets you take incredible photos in all conditions. And, because it comes with a quality 8MP front-facing camera, you've got an even better excuse to take stunning-looking selfies.

YOUR GATEWAY TO THE WORLD OF SAMSUNG
By connecting the Note8 to the Samsung DeX you can watch your favourite videos and view important documents from your phone directly onto any large screen. While using the Note8 with the Gear VR and Gear 360 lets you experience spectacular videos and games in virtual reality.

TOP PERFORMER
With 10nm mobile AP, 6GB of RAM and 64GB of internal memory, the Note8 ensures seamless usage while providing you with enough space to save your favourite content in one place. Plus, it comes with expandable memory supporting up to 256GB microSD so you can access and store more content quickly.



LEGAL DISCLAIMER
Shipping and Handling spacer All orders received before 1pm are aimed to be the same day Monday to Friday (Excluding Bank Holidays). Orders received after this time on Friday or over the weekend or bank holiday will be shipped the next working day. On Mondays we may not be able to ship the same day depending on order volume received over the weekend. We will ship only after receiving cleared payment through PayPal. eCheques can take up to 7 working days to clear please take this into account if required urgently. We will only ship to the PayPal confirmed address please do not ask to change address as we will need to refund and cancel the order. Please make sure the correct address is updated in PayPal before making payment, the address cannot be changed after payment. European destinations can vary in delivery time up to 5 working days please allow time for delivery. All items will be well packaged with bubble wrap, padded envelopes and secured with packing tape please do not accept delivery if it appears to have been tampered with or damaged in any way! All shipping services will require a signature and will be tracked for your security and ours. Thanks for doing business with us
